item.title: EMVP: Embracing Visual Foundation Model for Visual Place Recognition with Centroid-Free Probing
item.description: EMVP: A novel PEFT pipeline boosts Visual Place Recognition accuracy by 97.6% using Centroid-Free Probing & Dynamic Power Normalization, saving 64.3% of parameters.
